degSets 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    degSets

    The goal of degSets is to …

    Installation

    You can install the development version of degSets from GitHub with:

    # install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("CECADBioinformaticsCoreFacility/degSets")

    Example

    This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

    library(degSets)
degSets::run_app()

    Hosted Instance

    You can find an example instance of degSets hosted at shinyapps.io
